content:
Hi
From my point of view, it would be more clear if it was somewhere explained that the 2x2 block we have to place is filled with four '#'. It is also not explained what does mean the "you can clear" at the end of the last line. 
I admit I had to reverse engineering the tests to understand the subject.  

Finally, there is a troubling "." in the description of the last H lines : 
"Next H lines: A string of W characters, either . or #." 
I suggest to remove it:
Next H lines: A string of W characters, either . or #
Nice puzzle. It's quite easy but I think that's just fine. Looking forward to the next 1009. ;)
Good feedback, thanks. Hopefully it is clearer now.
